Author: ready2rope
Text: Maybe the “weight” you’re gaining is just poop/food weight. Are you pooping? I have this issue myself - I restrict heavily and end up maintaining for the better part of a week, or more, and also struggle to pass BMs, until I finally poop and get that “woosh”. That is most likely your problem. You have no reason to fear, if you’re eating under maintenance you *will* be losing body weight. Food weight is just annoying as hell!
